Description.Text: Centrally located on South Parade, the Windsor Hotel is situated within sight of the sea on the scenic Northumbrian Coast offering the perfect location for your stay whether on business or for pleasure. This property is the largest and most impressive hotel in Whitley Bay. This property offers 69 well-appointed en-suite rooms that are equipped with modern comforts to ensure you a pleasant stay. Guests can dine at the Bazil Brasserie that is open for breakfast and evening meals. This brasserie offers quality international dishes and fine wines in elegant and comfortable surroundings. The hotel also offers a well-appointed conference room that can accommodate up to 80 people for your meetings, seminars and other events. The hotel provides amenities like bar, conference facilities and reception.Breakfast is included.
The Windsor Hotel is just a 5 minute drive from the International Ferry Terminal.

Standard Room - Room with one twin bed includes color TV, disable facilities, ensuite/ private bathroom, hairdryer, laundry service, non-smoking rooms, tea and coffee making facilities, telephone and voicemail.
